caption:
This photograph captures a serene sailboat race or sailing event on a calm body of water. Multiple small, single-sail dinghies equipped with single sailors are visible. The waters appear calm, reflecting a sky that suggests a hazy, perhaps slightly overcast day.

The main focus of the image is a sailboat near the center, showing a sail marked with distinctive striped and triangular patterns in black and yellow, and the number "US2041." Just behind it, another sailboat features mostly a white sail with a graphic that resembles a lightning bolt and the number "US3445."

In the foreground, one can see a bright yellow buoy with a large "F" printed in black, serving as a marker or part of the race course. The buoyant marker is just slightly off-center in the front left of the image, adding contrast to the blue tones of the water.

The background is quite minimal with the faint outline of a bridge or structure at a very far distance, blending into the haze. The composition of the photo, along with the soft focus and subtle blues, creates a tranquil maritime scene emphasizing the leisure and sport of sailing.
title: Sailboat race on Chesapeake Bay
